net.sourceforge.taglets.simple.impl
Class TextFilterLogger

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.taglets.simple.impl.TextFilterLogger
All Implemented Interfaces:
Logger
public class TextFilterLogger
extends Object
implements Logger

Text filter initialization logger.

This logger is used during taglet initialization and it prefixes the log messages with the message type and the taglet that caused the log entry.

Version:
1.6 (2008/03/30 12:43:19)
Maintainer:
Bruno Essmann <essmann@sourceforge.net>
Since:
1.6.0
